responses.rationale: Describes a potential negative future possibility, not a capability, preparedness, or hopeful possibility.
Describes recommended actions ('recommends the following actions') which are preparedness/safeguard measures.
A question, not a statement of capability or preparedness.
Reports an outbreak, not capability or preparedness.
Reports deaths, not capability or preparedness.
Describes transmission mechanism, not capability or preparedness.
Reports outbreaks and spread, not capability or preparedness.
Describes attention from experts and transmission potential, not capability or preparedness.
Reports case numbers, not capability or preparedness.
Reports an outbreak, not capability or preparedness.
Reports an outbreak, not capability or preparedness.
Reports technical detail of outbreak, not capability or preparedness.
Reports an outbreak, not capability or preparedness.
Describes transmission mechanism, not capability or preparedness.
Describes a government action ('ordering poultry to be kept indoors') which is a safeguard/response measure.
Describes actions taken by other countries ('followed a similar move') which are response measures.
Describes a declared prevention zone and required measures ('prevention zone was declared', 'requiring all bird keepers to follow strict biosecurity measures').
Describes transmission risk, not capability or preparedness.
Reports a death, not capability or preparedness.
Reports a case and a response measure ('leading to a farm being placed in quarantine').
Reports test results/detection, not capability or preparedness.
Reports advice about a death, not capability or preparedness.
Describes existing measures ('movement controls were already in place') which are safeguards/response measures.
Describes planned actions ('will be safely disposed of', 'sites will be cleaned and cleared') which are response measures/safeguards.
Mentions 'ongoing surveillance activities' as a reason for detection, a preparedness measure.
Provides advice/recommendation ('housing birds... is an effective method') which is a safeguard/preparedness measure.
Provides advice/recommendation ('advised bird owners to follow best biosecurity practices') which is a safeguard/preparedness measure.
Describes existing and extended measures ('movement controls remain in place', 'restricted and control areas... have been extended').
Describes a requirement/measure ('Permits are required') which is a safeguard/response measure.
Describes actions being taken ('is implementing strict biosecurity measures', 'has been following the national response').
Reports a discovery/detection, not capability or preparedness.
Reports a death and symptoms, not capability or preparedness.
Reports patient history, not capability or preparedness.
Reports unknown source and virus detection, not capability or preparedness.
Describes an action taken ('applied the restriction') which is a safeguard/response measure.
Describes conditions for import ('can be imported, provided they are accompanied by a permit and a treated as per regulations') which are safeguards/regulations.
Reports a finding/detection, not capability or preparedness.
Describes a standard procedure/response measure ('the entire flock is killed').
Describes an ongoing situation, not capability or preparedness.
Reports a fact about a location, not capability or preparedness.
Reports losses, not capability or preparedness.
Reports cases and transmission mechanism, not capability or preparedness.
Describes actions taken by farmers ('take steps like requiring...') which are safeguards/preparedness measures.
Describes risk level and conditions for infection, not capability or preparedness.
Reports cases, not capability or preparedness.
Reports case numbers, not capability or preparedness.
Reports a case, not capability or preparedness.
Reports symptoms, not capability or preparedness.
Describes treatment and isolation ('being treated with antiviral medication', 'staying home') which are response measures/safeguards.
Reports location of work, not capability or preparedness.
Reports symptoms, not capability or preparedness.
Reports detection timeline, not capability or preparedness.
States risk level, not capability or preparedness.
Describes an activity ('Scientists are watching closely') which is a surveillance/monitoring activity, a form of preparedness.
Describes a planned action/testing ('would begin testing') which is a surveillance/monitoring activity, a form of preparedness.
Reports a past finding/ability ('ability to scan wastewater') which is a capability/development.
Describes an action being taken ('has begun scaling up H5-specific testing') which is a surveillance/preparedness measure.
Describes a potential benefit of a method ('could give communities another way to spot potential outbreaks') which is a future possibility/capability description.
Describes a past development ('developed a probe') which is a capability/development.
Describes the history of a tool and detection, not capability or preparedness.
Describes research actions and findings, not capability or preparedness.
Describes a hypothesis, not capability or preparedness.
Reports a case, not capability or preparedness.
Reports publication of results, not capability or preparedness.
Describes the state of a capability ('wastewater detection... is scant but encouraging').
Describes research findings ('began finding H5N1 sequences') which is a surveillance/monitoring activity, a form of preparedness.
Describes a capability ('wastewater monitoring capacity got a huge boost') and its effectiveness ('effective pandemic management tool').
Describes an action taken ('began releasing data') which is a surveillance/monitoring activity, a form of preparedness/transparency.
Describes how data could be used ('could be a reliable indicator') which is a description of the potential utility of a surveillance method.
Describes a planned action ('launching wastewater dashboard') which is a preparedness/surveillance measure.
Describes what a tool does ('serves up current levels', 'providing needed context') which is a description of a capability/tool.
Describes a current practice/limitation ('is only including data') which is a description of a surveillance method.
Describes an ongoing activity ('is in communication... to better understand the potential value') which is a preparedness/research activity.
Describes an ongoing activity ('continuing to review data and methodologies') which is a preparedness/surveillance activity.
Describes the state of knowledge/learning ('has to learn') about a capability.
Describes demand for data, not capability or preparedness.
Describes a question/need for data interpretation, not capability or preparedness.
Describes a capability/understanding ('Being able to disambiguate that, and understand where these signals are coming from').
Describes a potential method ('could be another way to track') which is a future possibility/capability description.
Describes ongoing research methods ('researchers are using to try to track') which is a surveillance/research activity, a form of preparedness.
Describes actions taken by scientists ('have begun sequencing... as a way to monitor') which is a surveillance/research activity, a form of preparedness.
Describes virus characteristics and potential future risks, not capability or preparedness.
Reports patient status, not capability or preparedness.
Describes a process ('sample was sent', 'was confirmed') which is part of a surveillance/testing process, a form of preparedness.
Describes the importance of an investigation ('results of this investigation will be particularly important') which is about a research/investigation activity, a form of preparedness.
Provides context about past cases, not capability or preparedness.
Describes a biological process and potential outcome, not capability or preparedness.
Describes a hypothetical virus characteristic, not capability or preparedness.
Describes an agency aim/effort ('aims "to do everything we can" to reduce the risk') which is a preparedness/response goal.
Reports an action taken ('birds were euthanized') which is a response measure.
Reports confirmation by an agency, not capability or preparedness.
Describes an action taken by an agency ('is urging poultry owners... to call') which is a surveillance/reporting measure, a form of preparedness.
Reports a finding/development, not capability or preparedness.
Describes concerns and potential implications, not capability or preparedness.
Reports an outbreak and observations, not capability or preparedness.
Reports deaths and a finding, not capability or preparedness.
Describes research methods and findings, not capability or preparedness.
Reports research findings, not capability or preparedness.
Describes a potential future implication, not capability or preparedness.
Describes virus characteristics, not capability or preparedness.
Reports past events/impact, not capability or preparedness.
Reports past spread, not capability or preparedness.
Reports detection timeline, not capability or preparedness.
Describes virus characteristics/capability, not human/agency capability or preparedness.
Describes virus capability, not human/agency capability or preparedness.
Describes the importance of research ('importance of continued research') which is about a research activity, a form of preparedness.
Describes potential future risk based on spread, not capability or preparedness.
Describes likely transmission route, not capability or preparedness.
Describes risk and lack of resources, not capability or preparedness.
Reports symptoms, not capability or preparedness.
Describes potential future risk, not capability or preparedness.
Reports a belief/opinion, not capability or preparedness.
Describes a method ('method being used to surveil') which is a surveillance method, a form of preparedness.
Describes a planned action/program ('would pay farmworkers... to be tested', 'offers incentives for farm owners to allow testing') which is a surveillance/testing program, a form of preparedness.
Describes the purpose of a payment related to monitoring ('compensates workers for their time contributing to the monitoring') which is about a monitoring activity, a form of preparedness.
Expresses an opinion about a payment, not capability or preparedness.
Discusses limitations of medical care arrangements, not capability or preparedness.
Describes a potential fear, not capability or preparedness.
Provides historical context, not capability or preparedness.
Provides historical example, not capability or preparedness.
Reports a lack of information/education, not capability or preparedness.
Describes a need/recommendation ('Education needs to be a part of testing efforts') which is a recommendation for a preparedness measure.
Describes how conversations should be conducted ('should be conducted in the farmworkers' language') which is a recommendation for a preparedness measure.
Describes an action taken by an agency ('asked states... to share personal protective equipment') which is a preparedness/safeguard measure.
Describes actions taken by agencies ('have offered to distribute such equipment') which are preparedness/safeguard measures.
Reports a request for equipment, not capability or preparedness.
Reports lack of requests, not capability or preparedness.
Expresses an opinion/recommendation about equipment ('protective equipment offerings need to be practical') which is about the implementation of a safeguard.
Discusses practicality of equipment ('wouldn't be realistic to expect them to also wear N95 face masks') which is about the implementation of a safeguard.
Suggests an alternative equipment/safeguard ('Plastic face shields seem like a better option').
Expresses worry, not capability or preparedness.
Describes working conditions, not capability or preparedness.
Reports deaths, not capability or preparedness.
Reports location of deaths, not capability or preparedness.
Reports test results/cause of death, not capability or preparedness.
Reports a case/finding, not capability or preparedness.
Reports a finding/trend, not capability or preparedness.
Reports a case, not capability or preparedness.
Describes treatment and outcome ('successfully treated with antiviral medications', 'has since been discharged') which are response measures.
Provides context about past cases, not capability or preparedness.
Attribution, not capability or preparedness.
Reports spread to mammals, not capability or preparedness.
Reports detection, not capability or preparedness.
Reports a case and transmission route, not capability or preparedness.
Reports symptoms and recovery ('are recovering') which is an outcome of response/treatment.
Reports historical mortality rate, not capability or preparedness.
Describes virus characteristic/opinion, not capability or preparedness.
Describes agencies working together to track ('working closely... to track the virus') which is a surveillance/preparedness activity.
Describes an action taken ('has also stepped up surveillance efforts') which is a surveillance/preparedness activity.
States an unknown, not capability or preparedness.
Reports evidence/opinion, not capability or preparedness.
Provides an example of spread, not capability or preparedness.
States a question/unknown, not capability or preparedness.
Describes a method and its potential utility ('Genetic sequencing will help trace') which is a surveillance/research method, a form of preparedness.
Describes advice/recommendation ('is advising dairy farmers to provide workers with masks, gloves and other protective equipment') which is a safeguard/preparedness measure.
Provides advice/recommendation ('should also avoid raw milk') which is a safeguard/preparedness measure.
Caption describing a photo, not capability or preparedness.
Reports a trend/increase, not capability or preparedness.
Describes a limitation/problem, not capability or preparedness.
Reports increases and confirmations, not capability or preparedness.
Reports testing numbers and a federal order ('federal order requiring dairy cow testing') which is a safeguard/response measure.
Reports attention being paid ('she’s paying “a lot of attention”') which is a form of monitoring/preparedness.
Describes the creation of a program ('created the National Animal Disease Preparedness and Response Program') which is a preparedness measure.
Describes the reauthorization of a program ('would be reauthorized') which is a preparedness measure.
Describes a potential area for improvement, not capability or preparedness.
Describes agencies working on communication ('working on building up their muscles for communicating') which is a preparedness/coordination activity.
Describes the introduction of a bill ('is introducing a bill... that would ban') which is a proposed safeguard/measure.
Describes what the bill targets, not capability or preparedness itself.
Describes the motivation for the bill, not capability or preparedness.
Expresses a strong opinion/call to action, not capability or preparedness.
Reports a research finding about a process ('amount of infectious bird flu virus... rapidly declines with heat treatment') which supports a safeguard.
Describes discussions about advancing a candidate ('in discussions... on advancing our pandemic flu candidate') which is a development/preparedness activity.
Describes a commitment and capability ('committed to using our mRNA platform to respond') which is a capability/preparedness statement.
Reports lack of response, not capability or preparedness.
Describes a characteristic of vaccines in trial ('cover the same virus family') which is about a development/capability.
Reports stock market data, not capability or preparedness.
Reports a change in regulation/restriction being lifted ('Bird shows can resume') which is a response measure being adjusted.
Describes a past action taken ('state halted poultry and waterfowl exhibitions') which is a safeguard/response measure.
Reports a past action taken ('ban was lifted') which is a response measure being adjusted.
Reports detection and characteristic, not capability or preparedness.
Reports spread and response ('prompting farms to euthanize millions of birds') which describes a response measure.
Describes transmission routes, not capability or preparedness.
Explains the reason for a past action, not capability or preparedness itself.
Provides a resource for information ('More information... can be found at Michigan.gov/birdflu') which is a communication/preparedness measure.
Reports restrictions being lifted ('restrictions have been lifted') which is a response measure being adjusted.
Reports a past outbreak, not capability or preparedness.
Reports a case, not capability or preparedness.
Reports confirmation and timeline, not capability or preparedness.
Describes the nature of the infection, not capability or preparedness.
Reports patient status and future possibility ('will soon be discharged') which is about the outcome of a case/treatment.
Reports cases, not capability or preparedness.
Reports actions taken ('culled birds') which is a response measure.
Reports detection and impact, not capability or preparedness.
Describes an agency action ('is also supporting the investigation') which is a preparedness/response activity.
Reports a case, not capability or preparedness.
Reports a past detection, not capability or preparedness.
Provides advice/recommendation ('should take precautions') which is a safeguard/preparedness measure.
Reports deaths, not capability or preparedness.
Reports test confirmation and death, not capability or preparedness.
Reports a death, not capability or preparedness.
Reports a past death, not capability or preparedness.
Reports a case and survival ('father was also found to be infected but survived') which is a positive outcome of response/treatment.
Headline reporting a death, not capability or preparedness.
Reports historical case and death numbers, not capability or preparedness.
Reports historical case numbers, not capability or preparedness.
Describes historical spread and endemic status, not capability or preparedness.
Reports historical impact, not capability or preparedness.
Reports geographical distribution of cases, not capability or preparedness.
Reports a trend/increase in outbreaks, not capability or preparedness.
Describes worry and potential future risk, not capability or preparedness.
Headline posing a question and offering information, not a statement of capability/safeguard.
Reports symptoms and timeline, not capability or preparedness.
Describes treatment received ('received treatment', 'was sent... for advanced care') which is a response/treatment measure.
Reports animal deaths, not capability or preparedness.
Describes an action taken ('had discarded the chickens') which is a safeguard/response measure.
Describes transmission routes, not capability or preparedness.
Expresses lack of understanding and a presumption about transmission, not capability or preparedness.
Reports health status and worry, not capability or preparedness.
Provides advice/recommendation ('advised not to feed') which is a safeguard/preparedness measure.
Describes sharing advice on preventive measures ('shared advice... on how pet owners can take preventive measures') which is a safeguard/preparedness measure.
Describes susceptibility, not capability or preparedness.
Reports deaths, not capability or preparedness.
Describes risk level and provides advice/recommendation ('should try to keep their pets away') which is a safeguard/preparedness measure.
Describes the disease and transmission potential, not capability or preparedness.
Reports an outbreak and cases, not capability or preparedness.
Describes a general farming practice, not a safeguard against bird flu.
